description.p: eNvolution is a fork of PostNuke. The entire core of the product is being replaced and improved, making it far more secure and stable, and able to work in high-volume environments with ease.

Some of the highlights of eNvolution are: customization of all aspects of the website's appearance via templates caching for faster page loads, user friendly administration via the configuration tools in the adminstration panel support, and a very active development community
